about_the_game:
CAN YOU ESCAPE THE GREAT ONE'S PRISON?

Cosmic Call is a brutal 3D FPS Roguelike Boomer shooter set inside the prison of the Great One. Many have entered this prison, succumbing to its never-ending torture and its relentless cycle of death and retries, but none have ever managed to escape. Fight your way out of this hellish nightmare, collecting otherworldly weapons and horrifying items along the way. Unlock mythical skulls that grant you extraordinary powers, perhaps just enough to rip your way through all the beasts and monsters and finally break free from this accursed hell.

CONTROLS:
W,A,S,D - TO WALK
R - TO RELOAD
E - TO INTERACT / PICK THINGS UP
F - TO KICK
G - TO DROP THINGS

The Demo includes the first two levels on repeat, with alternating bosses from the first level.
Have fun :3

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer
  • Processor: 2.40Ghz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer
  • Processor: 3.40Ghz+
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
